page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
The children of Glenprosen School involved in completing this project and the main sections they took charge of were : Angela Grieve (12) School Laura Johnston (11) Communications Diana Boath (11) Forestry Micheal Grieve (10) Church Duncan Petrie (10) Farming Nicola Grieve ( 9) Social Life Alastair MacLean ( 9)Balnaboth Estate Lynne Johnston ( 8) Birds Duncan MaLean ( 7) Wild Animals
We would like to thank Rev. D. Leadbeater the Minister, Mrs P. Paton the farmer at Spott Farm, Mr C. Riddell wildlife expert , Mr R. Johnston the Forester and Mr H.MacLean Laird at Balaboth Estate. Photographs taken by Mr & Mrs D. Orr.
